cgcloud__Promotion__c.name: cgcloud__Promotion__c
cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: Promotion is an activity of a user that includes the definition of prices for a time segment.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Decides whether a promotion is available.

cgcloud__Aggregation_Category__c.description: Stores information about the aggregation category.

cgcloud__Commit_Date__c.description: Date on which the promotion was committed. This field is used to fetch the prices and discounts of a promotion.

cgcloud__Count_Tactics__c.description: Number of tactics associated with this promotion.

cgcloud__Custom1_Date_From__c.description: Start date of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Custom1_Date_Thru__c.description: End date of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Custom2_Date_From__c.description: Start date of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Custom2_Date_Thru__c.description: End date of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Effective_Brands__c.description: Stores a list (JSON array) of the effective Brand SfIds for this promotion.

cgcloud__Effective_Categories__c.description: Stores a list (JON array) of the effective Category Sf IDs for this promotion.

cgcloud__ExternalId__c.description: ID of the promotion that's used as a reference in external systems. Integration uses this ID to import tactic-specific actuals into the offplatform back end.

cgcloud__Filter_Criteria__c.description: Stores the .json file that's used to apply product filters for the promotion.

cgcloud__Group_Text_Language_1__c.description: Stores the Group Text in language 1.

cgcloud__Group_Text_Language_2__c.description: Stores the Group Text in language 2.

cgcloud__Group_Text_Language_3__c.description: Stores the Group Text in language 3.

cgcloud__Group_Text_Language_4__c.description: Stores the Group Text in language 4.

cgcloud__In_Calculation_Time_Frame__c.description: Checks the condition for calculation-relevant promotions within the offset timeframe (90 days) from today's date, and returns a boolean value.

cgcloud__Is_Frozen__c.description: Indicates whether a dynamic product set is to be frozen so that it can't be changed anymore. This can be set manually or via a a workflow rule.

cgcloud__Is_Locked__c.description: Indicates whether the promotion is locked.

cgcloud__Is_Push_In_Progress__c.description: Indicates whether the push process for this promotion is currently in progress. This attribute is applicable for pushable promotions.

cgcloud__Is_Transferable__c.description: Identifies whether the promotion is eligible for transfer.

cgcloud__KPI_Dirty__c.description: This field is set as true whenever there is any modification in the promotion record.

cgcloud__Last_Push_Update_Executed__c.description: Timestamp when the parent promotion was last pushed.

cgcloud__Last_Push_Update_Received__c.description: Timestamp when the child promotion received the last push update.

cgcloud__Lock_Deletion__c.description: Configures promotions to indicate whether a promotion deletion is locked based on phases.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input__c.description: Stores the configuration of manually updated KPIs in .json format.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input_2__c.description: Continuation of Manual_Calculation_Input__c. Filled if the manual calculation input .json is bigger than 128k.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input_3__c.description: Continuation of Manual_Calculation_Input_2__c. Filled if the manual calculation input .json is bigger than 256k.

cgcloud__Outdated_Staging_Records__c.description: Indicates whether this attribute must be recalculated when conditions are changed.

cgcloud__Promotion_Template_Description_.description: Stores the description of the selected promotion template.

cgcloud__Push_Target_Account_Selection__.description: Only filled for Pushable promotions. Contains a .json file with the selected push target accounts.

cgcloud__Reference_Date__c.description: Reference date that's used for hierarchy search. The date is retrieved from the promotion template used reference date field.

cgcloud__Relevant_For_Account_Plan__c.description: Indicates whether the promotion is relevant for Account Plan Calculation.

cgcloud__Scenario_1_Manual_Inputs__c.description: Stores the promotion-specific manual input for Scenario 1.

cgcloud__Scenario_1_Parameters__c.description: Stores scenario parameters for Scenario 1 in .json format.

cgcloud__Scenario_2_Manual_Inputs__c.description: Stores promotion-specific manual input for Scenario 2.

cgcloud__Scenario_2_Parameters__c.description: Stores scenario parameters for Scenario 2 in .json format.

cgcloud__Scenario_3_Manual_Inputs__c.description: Stores promotion-specific manual input for Scenario 3.

cgcloud__Scenario_3_Parameters__c.description: Stores scenario parameters for Scenario 3 in .json format.

cgcloud__Scenario_4_Manual_Inputs__c.description: Stores promotion-specific manual input for Scenario 4.

cgcloud__Scenario_4_Parameters__c.description: Stores scenario parameters for Scenario 4 in .json format.

cgcloud__Scenario_5_Manual_Inputs__c.description: Stores promotion-specific manual input for Scenario 5.

cgcloud__Scenario_5_Parameters__c.description: Stores scenario parameters for Scenario 5 in .json format.

cgcloud__Selected_Scenario__c.description: Indicates the active scenario for the promotion.

cgcloud__Skip_Version_Update__c.description: Flag that's used to skip the version update. This flag is stored as false in the database, but the system verifies the input value to detect whether the version is to be upgraded.

cgcloud__Sub_Accounts_Selection__c.description: Determines the selection of the valid sub accounts of the parent customer.

cgcloud__Sync_Relevant_Changes__c.description: Used for push promotions. This object indicates whether any changes are done to this promotion, which is to be synced down to the child promotions.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color_Code_1__c.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color_Code_2__c.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color_Code_3__c.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color_Code_4__c.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Color_Code_5__c.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Transparency_1__.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Transparency_2__.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Transparency_3__.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Transparency_4__.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Trade_Calendar_Transparency_5__.description: Property Based Coloring of Promotion Bars in the Trade Calendar.

cgcloud__Transferred_Version__c.description: Last transferred version value of the source promotion.

cgcloud__Version_Synced_Off_Platform__c.description: Version that Off Platform operations receive.

cgcloud__Version__c.description: Current version of the record. The system updates this field after each operation.

cgcloud__Volume_Percent__c.description: SmartUI calculates this field every time the Sub Account list values are updated.
